entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
